column2: Demonic/Fallen content is OFF. Existing demons will still remain. Society of Seduction disabled.\n
Divine content is OFF. Existing divines will still remain.\n
Elven content is OFF. Existing elvens will still remain.\n
Orcish content is OFF. Existing orcs will still remain.\n
Fairy content is OFF. Existing fairies will still remain.\n
Kitsune content is OFF. Existing kitsune will still remain.\n
Neko content is OFF. Existing nekos will still remain.\n
Blood Feud attacks are ON. Failure is never fatal.\n
Blood Feud attacks are ON. Failure results in death.\n
This is the options menu for Luxuria Fantasia. You can set various content rules here.

This is the Luxuria Fantasia Options Menu. Here, you can set various content on or off. If you do not have the appropriate module installed, the options wont do anything.

[DemonOnOff][DivineOnOff][ElfOnOff][OrcOnOff][FairyOnOff][KitsuneOnOff][NekoOnOff][ClassicOnOff][BFAttacksOnOff]
[SillyOnOff][SpecialNPCsOnOff]
All characters in this realm (or subrealm, if playing a vassal) will be this race.
